newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Infratil Australia to seek ASX listing in 1997.
newsitem.headline: Infratil Australia to seek ASX listing in 1997.

text.p: Wellington-based merchant bankers H.R.L. Morrison & Co Ltd, which manages utility investor Infrastructure and Utilities NZ Ltd, said on Wednesday Infratil Australia Ltd would seek Australian Stock Exchange listing during 1997.
Infratil Australia Ltd is an unlisted public company.

Morrison & Co made the statement as part of an announcement of its intention to form a new company, Infratil International Ltd. It said a pro rata renounceable rights offer in the new company to Infrastructure and Utiltities NZ Ltd (Infratil NZ) shareholders was possible.
Morrison & Co manages both Infratil Australia and Infratil NZ. --Wellington Newsroom (64 4) 4734746
